Flow.description: GTMS-20573: Created as part of Partner Alignment project to create Channel Relationships for Amendment Opportunity or Existing Open Opportuntiy. UATPILOT-94: Added update opportunity element to update partner values. on 7/11/24 GTMS-24948: Updated as part of Partner Alignment Systems Phase 1 Hyper care issue, to fetch rebate opportunities related to selected opportunity on 10/9/24 GTMS-24969: Updated as part of Partner Alignment Systems Phase 1 Hyper care issue, to add selected existing oppty Notes__c values with More About Opportunity Field value in Partner Registration record 10/9/24 GTMS-25123: Removed/Replaced the Reseller view managed package references in the flow on 10/21/24 GTMS-26124 & GTMS-26107: Updated as part of Partners H1 project to map Partner Program and Program Enrollment values in CR record GTMS-26936: Deleted Rebate Opportunity creation logic as part of Partners H1 project GTMS-28680: Created logic to map Partner Interaction type field value based on How the Amendment oppty got created.

formulas.description: UATPILOT-94: Created as part of Partner Alignment project to store the installer name
formulas.name: Installer_Info

formulas.description: UATPILOT-94: Created as part of partner Alignment project. to get insurance partner value
formulas.name: Insurance_Partner
formulas.expression: IF( OR( CONTAINS({!ProgramType},"Teaming"), CONTAINS({!ProgramType},"Premium Discount"), CONTAINS({!ProgramType},"Subsidy"), CONTAINS({!ProgramType},"Safety Program") ), IF( OR( ISBLANK({!Get_Opportunity_Record.Insurance_Partner__c}), ISNULL({!Get_Opportunity_Record.Insurance_Partner__c}) ), {!CurrentPartnerRegistration.Partner_Account__c}, {!Get_Opportunity_Record.Insurance_Partner__c} ), NULL )
